ComicInfo.Title: Skeletons In The Closet
ComicInfo.Summary:
“OPERATION: FISH FRY”
Loyalties are divided as Dante’s true intentions are brought to question. The threat of Doctor Koi looms, and The Intrepids struggle to put their differences aside to come together in the most dangerous mission of their lives.
